LanguageData.MLRP_WelcomeMessage: [My Little RimPony] v{0} loaded. Remember, friendship is magic!
LanguageData.MLRP_NothingToCure: [My Little RimPony] Error: Attempted to cure non-existent hediff(s) on {0}.
LanguageData.MLRP_AntiBronyHasPlushieExplanation: A pawn with the anti brony trait has a pony plushie equipped, which will cause a mood penalty until it is dropped. It might be worth assigning anti bronies a separate outfit in order to prevent this.

LanguageData.MLRP_PoisonJokeBadSight: Smoking poison joke has rendered {0} blind.

LanguageData.MLRP_AntiBronyHasHarmonyChipAlertText: A pawn with the anti brony trait has a harmony chip installed. This will cause a -10 penalty to their mood until it is removed.

LanguageData.MLRP_TreeOfHarmony: Turn the anima tree into the Tree of Harmony
LanguageData.MLRP_HPOldBonusesExp: If enabled, the bonuses provided by the Harmony precept will be returned to the values they had prior to Version 3.43.49 of the mod, which is when they were reduced to what they are now.
LanguageData.MLRP_SBMechCluster: Sweetie Bot mechanoids appear in mechanoid clusters
LanguageData.MLRP_SBMute: Mute Sweetie Bot mechanoid call sound
LanguageData.MLRP_XenoChem: Enable drug dependencies for Diamond Dog/Pegasus/Unicorn xenotypes
LanguageData.MLRP_XenoReminder: Changing this mid-game will only affect newly spawned pawns of that xenotype.
LanguageData.MLRP_NPCFaction: NPC faction is always present when starting a new colony
LanguageData.MLRP_DogFaction: Diamond Dog faction is always present when starting a new colony
LanguageData.MLRP_BatFaction: Batpony faction is always present when starting a new colony
LanguageData.MLRP_FactionExplanation: If checked, this faction will automatically be added to the world when starting a new colony.
LanguageData.TreeOfHarmonyDesc:
The Tree of Harmony is a magical tree that once held the Elements of Harmony. Nobody knows how it ended up on the rim, but many people suspect that science was involved.

If a person (psycaster or not) meditates near the tree, it will grow harmony grass around its base. Once enough grass is grown, it becomes possible to carry out a psychic linking ritual with the tree and upgrade a person's psychic powers. Only tribal peoples know the secret of this ritual. Tribal psycasters are also able to draw psyfocus from the Tree of Harmony while meditating at it.

The tree's psychic properties are weakened if artificial structures are placed nearby. They refuse to be caged or studied, and must remain part of nature.

Most tribes believe that these trees are not simply trees, but are rather the physical extremities of a single world spirit, while bronies believe them to be a physical extension of their beliefs.
LanguageData.TreeOfHarmonyLinkLetterTitle: About: Linking with the Tree of Harmony
LanguageData.TreeOfHarmonyLinkLetterText:
The Tree of Harmony now has {0} harmony grass around it. This is enough for a tribal person to begin their first linking ritual!

The linking ritual gives a level of psylink and the ability to use psychic powers. Upgrading to a higher level requires 20 grass.

The harmony grass requirements for linking rituals to upgrade psycasters are:

{1}

Note: Only those with the nature focus type can meditate to or link with the Tree of Harmony. You can see a person's focus types by looking at their info card with the 'i' button.
LanguageData.TreeOfHarmonyDeath: The Tree of Harmony has died and emitted a disturbing psychic scream.
LanguageData.HarmonyGrassDesc:
A grass infused with luminous microorganisms. Tribal peoples find that this grass grows around the base of the Tree of Harmony as they meditate. It seems to reflect some kind of strengthening of the tree's psychic power.

Animals refuse to eat anima grass, which tribal stories say is done out of respect.

Bronies believe that the grass is a physical extension of the tree's power, and that it holds the key to opening a link to Equestria, but the grass degenerates into normal plant matter when observed too closely.
LanguageData.MLRP_ConfirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?
LanguageData.MLRP_MedievalOverhaul: [My Little RimPony] Medieval Overhaul patches have been applied.
